title: ChatUI Figma Plugin
description: An AI-assisted Figma plugin that generates and updates UI elements from natural-language instructions in real time.

title: Resume Analyzer & Builder
description: An AI-powered tool that analyzes resumes for ATS compliance and helps create optimized, professional resumes.

title: Peer Chat
description: A peer-to-peer chat application enabling direct browser-to-browser communication with signaling via Socket.io.

title: EmpathAI
description: An AI therapy assistant for students that uses sentiment analysis to provide empathetic, context-aware responses.

title: Agile Project Dashboard
description: A task and sprint management tool for agile teams with project tracking, collaboration, and progress visualization.

title: Digit Recognition Trainer
description: An interactive web tool to train and test handwritten digit recognition models using the MNIST dataset.

title: Story Weaver
description: A collaborative storytelling platform enabling real-time, dynamic story creation with the Google Gemini API.

title: Linux From Scratch (LFS/BLFS)
description: Building a custom Linux system entirely from source code, including Beyond Linux From Scratch (BLFS) extensions.

title: KSRTC Bus Management System
description: A database-driven system for managing bus routes, schedules, reservations, and passenger details for KSRTC.

title: Seating Chart App
description: A dynamic seating arrangement tool for events and classrooms, allowing drag-and-drop seat assignments.

title: Screen Recorder Pro
description: A free Chrome extension for simultaneous screen and camera capture with no watermarks or time limits.
